Question 14 
[Computer Organization & Architecture (Machine Instruction and Addressing)]
 
 
The format of a single – precision floating - point number as per the 
IEEE 754 
standard is :
Sign 
(1 bit)
Exponent
Mantissa
(23 bits) 
 
Choose the largest floating - point number among the following options. 
 
(A)
(8 bits)
Sign 
Exponent 
Mantissa 
0 
0111 1111 
1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111
(B)  
 
 
Sign 
Exponent 
Mantissa 
0 
1111 1110 
1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 1111
(C)  
 
 
Sign 
Exponent 
Mantissa 
0 
1111 1111 
1111 1111 1111 1111 1111 111
(D)
Sign 
Exponent 
Mantissa 
0 
0111 1111 
0000 0000 0000 0000 0000 000
explanation_text:
Sol.
 
As per described IEEE 754
Single precision format
Sign : 0
Exponent : 11111110
Mantissa : 23 1’s
Will give maximum value.
Hence, the correct option is (B).
